comment: Best Irish Whiskey. Back to the basic pot still too long in the waiting.
Smooth with a slightly sweet Carmel note. I've enjoyed this with a couple of friends & before we knew it, the bottle was gone. Addicting.
full flavor. sweet. really like it!
A bit pricier than the regular version of Powers but not different (re: better) enough for me to merit the price differential.
Tried this at the Ashford castle and enjoyed it. Easy drinking w vanilla and caramel
